news.headline: Apple's AI Comeback Plans Include Robots, Lifelike Siri
news.summary: Apple Inc. is plotting its artificial intelligence comeback with an ambitious slate of new devices, including robots, a lifelike version of Siri, a smart speaker with a display and home-security cameras. news.headline: Foxconn sees robust AI demand continuing after Q2 profit tops forecast
news.summary: TAIPEI (Reuters) -Foxconn expects higher third-quarter revenue, it said on Thursday, on robust demand for artificial intelligence servers, which helped the world's largest contract electronics maker report a forecast-beating 27% increase in second-quarter profit. news.headline: Elon Musk broadens his long-running feud with OpenAI’s Sam Altman by bringing in a third party: Apple
news.summary: Musk is unhappy with how Apple is promoting ChatGPT, a rival to his own Grok.

news.headline: Amazon same-day delivery, Apple's AI, Centrus: Trending Tickers
news.summary: Amazon (AMZN) is expanding its same-day grocery delivery offerings. Apple (AAPL) will reportedly unveil new artificial intelligence (AI) products, according to Bloomberg reports.
